channel.title: How wud u remove weapons from a server?
channel.description: iv got some glitched weps on a server, and i thort rather than fixin them cos is takin too long for me, i might aswel remove or disable them? any help on that cheers

item.title: How wud u remove weapons from a server?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, there’s a few ways you can go about this.
in the item.cfg, you can change all of it’s stats to 0.
You can remove them from all drops/shops.
You can make it so when you use the item command and try to spawn one of them, it won’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: How wud u remove weapons from a server?
